function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper air quality monitoring leading to potential exposure to air contaminants and pollutants.","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory diseases and other health issues due to poor air quality.","Mitigation":"Implementing reliable air quality monitoring systems and regular maintenance of monitoring equipment.","Technologies":"Cloud-based air quality monitoring systems, IoT sensors for air quality measurement.","People":"Building occupants, residents, and workers in the built environment.","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, and air quality experts."},{"Description":"Inadequate indoor air quality assessment leading to potential health risks from indoor pollutants.","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory diseases, allergies, and other health issues due to poor indoor air quality.","Mitigation":"Deploying comprehensive indoor air quality monitoring systems and using real-time data for assessment and control.","Technologies":"Comprehensive indoor air quality monitoring systems, VOC and PM sensors, IoT-based monitoring systems.","People":"Building occupants, residents, and workers in indoor environments.","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, and indoor environmental quality experts."}]}
